name: featuredtournamentsevents
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool sportifyapi.
Tool description: Real-time sports data platform providing comprehensive information on tournaments, matches, players, and live scores for various sports.  
API description: Fetches featured events for a given unique tournament from the Sportify API.

uniquetournamentid.description: The unique identifier for the tournament whose featured events are to be fetched.
